Instruction: In a large bowl,  toss the broccoli florets with olive oil, minced garlic, salt, and black pepper until evenly coated.
Spread the broccoli in a single layer on a baking sheet.
Roast in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the broccoli is tender and starting to caramelize, stirring halfway through cooking.
Remove from the oven and serve hot as a flavorful side dish.
